title: Ibis analytics
text:
Overview
We use Ibis for analytics about Ibis.



Source: Voltron Data Composable Codex


This project uses:

User interface: Ibis (Python dataframe code and/or SQL)
Execution engine: DuckDB (local) and ClickHouse (remote)
Data storage: Delta Lake tables (local and/or cloud object storage) and ClickHouse tables (remote)

You can mix and match execution engines and data storage via Ibis.

title: Ibis analytics
text:
Setup

DevelopmentPip


Install gh and just and uv, then:
gh repo clone ibis-project/ibis-analytics
cd ibis-analytics
just setup
. .venv/bin/activate


pip install ibis-analytics

title: Ibis analytics
text:
Usage
Use the CLI:
ia
Open the dashboard:
ia dash

title: Ibis analytics
text:
